'''1.21.123''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on November 13, 2025, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/41112550913677-Minecraft-1-21-123-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.123 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 13, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.123
|167489|Textures turn pink (after playing for long periods of time).
|179496|Memory leak when the "Improved Input Response" option is enabled.
|230558|When pressing any of the number keys on an item in a stonecutter, the game crashes.
|otherissuescount=4}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed an issue where IME Candidates would appear in the wrong monitor or misplaced in relation to text field.
* Fixed IME input when application lost and regained focus (switching from the app and back while editing).
* Blocks with the tick component tick when placed by Jigsaw Structure during world generation.
